mutants.code:
def maximize_beauty(n, m, k, a):
    indexed_a = list(zip(a, range(n)))
    sorted_indexed_a = sorted(indexed_a, reverse=True)
    sorted_a = [x for (x, _) in sorted_indexed_a]
    partition_indices = [y for (_, y) in sorted_indexed_a[:m * k]]
    partition_indices.sort()
    max_beauty_sum = sum(sorted_a[:m * k])
    result = [x - 1 for x in partition_indices[m - 1::m]]
    return (max_beauty_sum, result[:-1])

    partition_indices = [y for (_, y) in sorted_indexed_a[:m * k]]
    partition_indices.sort()
    max_beauty_sum = sum(sorted_a[:m * k])
    result = [x * 1 for x in partition_indices[m - 1::m]]
    return (max_beauty_sum, result[:-1])
